data.title: CW/A 'Bury The Hatchet' by Giorgio Gremigni | Videos
data.meta_description: Sharp strings, lethal rays, and dark surroundings make up the edgy visuals for CW/A's Bury The Hatchet, from their album Words Unspoken, Acts Undone. …
data.text:
Cat Velez - 17th Nov 2015

Sharp strings, lethal rays, and dark surroundings make up the edgy visuals for CW/A's Bury The Hatchet, from their album Words Unspoken, Acts Undone. Made by Giorgio Gremigni, the video was completely hand crafted using plaster, strings, woods and minerals, with no CGI, no 3D, no plugins involved.

Excellent work by Gremigni, who's previous work includes editing Damon Albarn's Everyday Robots video.
